Package it.unipr.barbato.Interface.Message

Interface MessageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageHandlerImpl
public interface MessageHandler
The MessageHandler interface provides methods for interacting with JMS messages.
Author:
Vincenzo Barbato 345728

    Method
    Description
    jakarta.jms.QueueSession
    getQueueSession()
    Returns the QueueSession associated with this MessageHandler.
    void
    publish(String topic_name, Serializable obj, RequestType type)
    Publishes a message to the specified topic.
    void
    receive(String queue_name)
    Receives messages from the specified queue and sets the MessageListener for processing received messages.

  • Method Details

    • getQueueSession

      jakarta.jms.QueueSession getQueueSession()
      Returns the QueueSession associated with this MessageHandler.
      Returns:
      the QueueSession object.

    • publish

      void publish(String topic_name, Serializable obj, RequestType type) throws jakarta.jms.JMSException
      Publishes a message to the specified topic.
      Parameters:
      topic_name - the name of the topic to publish the message to.
      obj - the Serializable object to be published.
      type - the type of the request.
      Throws:
      jakarta.jms.JMSException - if there is an error while publishing the message.

    • subscribe

      void subscribe(String topic_name) throws jakarta.jms.JMSException
      Subscribes to the specified topic and sets the MessageListener for receiving messages.
      Parameters:
      topic_name - the name of the topic to subscribe to.
      Throws:
      jakarta.jms.JMSException - if there is an error while subscribing to the topic.

    • receive

      void receive(String queue_name) throws jakarta.jms.JMSException
      Receives messages from the specified queue and sets the MessageListener for processing received messages.
      Parameters:
      queue_name - the name of the queue to receive messages from.
      Throws:
      jakarta.jms.JMSException - if there is an error while receiving messages from the queue.

    • send

      void send(String queue_name, Serializable obj, RequestType type) throws jakarta.jms.JMSException
      Sends a message to the specified queue and sets the MessageListener for processing the response.
      Parameters:
      queue_name - the name of the queue to send the message to.
      obj - the Serializable object to be sent.
      type - the type of the request.
      Throws:
      jakarta.jms.JMSException - if there is an error while sending the message.

    • setOnSubscribe

      void setOnSubscribe(jakarta.jms.MessageListener messageListener)
      Sets the MessageListener for subscribing to messages.
      Parameters:
      messageListener - the MessageListener object.

    • setOnReceive

      void setOnReceive(jakarta.jms.MessageListener customOnMessage)
      Sets the MessageListener for receiving messages.
      Parameters:
      customOnMessage - the MessageListener object.

    • setOnSend

      void setOnSend(jakarta.jms.MessageListener customOnMessage)
      Sets the MessageListener for sending messages.
      Parameters:
      customOnMessage - the MessageListener object.
